mapper.select: SELECT Member_no as memberNo, member_name as memberName, Id as id, Member_Type as memberType, Member_Gender as memberGender, Member_Age as memberAge, Member_Status as memberStatus, Member_Img as memberImg, Join_Date as joinDate FROM t_with_member where member_no = #{memberNo}

select gr.group_no as groupNo, gr.group_name as groupName, gr.group_detail as groupDetail, gr.group_maxperson as groupMaxPerson, gr.group_nowperson as groupNowPerson, gr.GROUP_ACTIVELONGITUDE as groupActiveLongitude, gr.GROUP_ACTIVELATITUDE as groupActiveLatitude, gr.GROUP_ACTIVEPLACE as groupActivePlace, gr.group_email as groupEmail, GROUP_TEL as groupTel, gr.GROUP_CONFIRMTYPE as groupConfirmType, gr.GROUP_REPIMAGEPATH as groupRepImagePath, gr.GROUP_RECRUITSTARTDATE as groupRecruitStartDate, gr.GROUP_RECRUITENDDATE as groupRecruitEndDate, gr.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, member.member_name as memberName, gr.group_StartDate as groupStartDate, gr.group_StartTime as groupStartTime, gr.group_EndDate as groupEndDate, gr.group_EndTime as groupEndTime from t_with_studygroup gr, t_with_member member where group_no = #{groupNo} and gr.member_no = member.member_no
mapper.insert: insert into T_WITH_JOINSTUDYGROUP ( MEMBER_NO, GROUP_NO, GROUP_GRADE, MEMBER_STATUS, GROUP_COMMENT, MEMBER_TEL ) values( #{memberNo}, #{groupNo}, '일반', #{memberStatus}, #{groupComment}, #{memberTel} )
